properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index to create

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Index aliases which include the index, as an alias object

options.name: aliases
options.description: Index aliases which include the index, as an alias object

options.name: include_type_name
options.description: Whether a mapping type is expected in the body of mappings. Defaults to false.

options.name: mappings
options.description: Mapping for fields in the index, as mapping object

options.name: master_timeout
options.description: Period to wait for a connection to the master node. If no response is received before the timeout expires, the request fails and returns an error. Defaults to 1m. See the Elasticsearch time units reference

options.name: settings
options.description: Configuration options for the index, as an index settings object

options.name: timeout
options.description: Period to wait for a response. If no response is received before the timeout expires, the request fails and returns an error. Defaults to 30s. See the Elasticsearch time units reference

options.name: wait_for_active_shards
options.description: The number of shard copies that must be active before proceeding with the operation. Set to all or any positive integer up to the total number of shards in the index. Default: 1, the primary shard

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index to delete

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index to retrieve

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or _all value. Defaults to true.

options.name: allow_no_indices
options.description: If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or _all value. Defaults to true.

options.name: expand_wildcards
options.description: Type of index that wildcard expressions can match. Defaults to open

options.name: flat_settings
options.description: Whether to return settings in flat format. Defaults to false.

options.name: ignore_unavailable
options.description: Whether to request that target a missing index return an error. Defaults to false.

options.name: include_defaults
options.description: Whether to return all default settings in the response. Defaults to false.

options.name: local
options.description: Whether to retrieve information from the local node only. Defaults to false.

options.name: master_timeout
options.description: Period to wait for a connection to the master node. If no response is received before the timeout expires, the request fails and returns an error. Defaults to 1m. See the Elasticsearch time units reference

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index containing the document to delete

properties.name: documentId
properties.description: ID of the document to delete

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to use the bulk operation to delete the document/s

options.name: bulkOperation
options.description: Whether to use the bulk operation to delete the document/s

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index containing the document to retrieve

properties.name: documentId
properties.description: ID of the document to retrieve

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Comma-separated list of source fields to exclude from the response

options.name: _source_excludes
options.description: Comma-separated list of source fields to exclude from the response

options.name: _source_includes
options.description: Comma-separated list of source fields to include in the response

options.name: stored_fields
options.description: Whether to retrieve the document fields stored in the index rather than the document _source. Defaults to false.

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index containing the documents to retrieve

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.displayName: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.
properties.name: paginateNotice
limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: options
properties.description: If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or _all value. Defaults to true.

options.name: allow_no_indices
options.description: If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or _all value. Defaults to true.

options.name: allow_partial_search_results
options.description:
If true, return partial results if there are shard request timeouts or shard failures.

If false, returns an error with no partial results. Defaults to true.

.

options.name: batched_reduce_size
options.description: Number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. Defaults to 512.

options.name: ccs_minimize_roundtrips
options.description: Whether network round-trips between the coordinating node and the remote clusters are minimized when executing cross-cluster search (CCS) requests. Defaults to true.

options.name: docvalue_fields
options.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return as the docvalue representation of a field for each hit

options.name: expand_wildcards
options.description: Type of index that wildcard expressions can match. Defaults to open

options.name: explain
options.description: Whether to return detailed information about score computation as part of a hit. Defaults to false.

options.name: ignore_throttled
options.description: Whether concrete, expanded or aliased indices are ignored when frozen. Defaults to true.

options.name: ignore_unavailable
options.description: Whether missing or closed indices are not included in the response. Defaults to false.

options.name: max_concurrent_shard_requests
options.description: Define the number of shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. Defaults to 5.

options.name: pre_filter_shard_size
options.description: Define a threshold that enforces a pre-filter roundtrip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting. Only used if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold.

options.name: query
options.description: Query in the Elasticsearch Query DSL

options.name: request_cache
options.description: Whether the caching of search results is enabled for requests where size is 0. See Elasticsearch shard request cache settings.

options.name: routing
options.description: Target this primary shard

options.name: search_type
options.description: How distributed term frequencies are calculated for relevance scoring. Defaults to Query then Fetch.

options.name: seq_no_primary_term
options.description: Whether to return the sequence number and primary term of the last modification of each hit. See Optimistic concurrency control.

options.name: sort
options.description: Comma-separated list of field:direction pairs

options.name: _source_excludes
options.description: Comma-separated list of source fields to exclude from the response

options.name: _source_includes
options.description: Comma-separated list of source fields to include in the response

options.name: stats
options.description: Tag of the request for logging and statistical purposes

options.name: stored_fields
options.description: Whether to retrieve the document fields stored in the index rather than the document _source. Defaults to false.

options.name: terminate_after
options.description: Max number of documents to collect for each shard

options.name: timeout
options.description: Period to wait for active shards. Defaults to 1m (one minute). See the Elasticsearch time units reference

options.name: track_scores
options.description: Whether to calculate and return document scores, even if the scores are not used for sorting. Defaults to false.

options.name: track_total_hits
options.description: Number of hits matching the query to count accurately. Defaults to 10000.

options.name: version
options.description: Whether to return document version as part of a hit. Defaults to false.

properties.name: indexId
properties.description: ID of the index to add the document to

properties.name: dataToSend
properties.description: Set the value for each destination column

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

properties.name: inputsToIgnore
properties.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: ID of the document to create and add to the index

options.name: bulkOperation
options.description: Whether to use the bulk operation to create the document/s

options.name: pipeline
options.description: ID of the pipeline to use to preprocess incoming documents

options.name: refresh
options.description: If true, Elasticsearch refreshes the affected shards to make this operation visible to search,if wait_for then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search,if false do nothing with refreshes

options.name: True
options.description: Refreshes the affected shards to make this operation visible to search

options.name: Wait For
options.description: Wait for a refresh to make this operation visible

options.name: False
options.description: Do nothing with refreshes

paginateNotice.displayName: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.
paginateNotice.name: paginateNotice

possibleValues.name: Define Below for Each Column
possibleValues.description: Set the value for each destination column

possibleValues.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
possibleValues.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

notices.name: paginateNotice
notices.text: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
